entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
